page.title: 16LOLLIPOP LADIES
page.content: BILL QUAY Lollipop ladies are people who help you cross the road.They can only cross children.They wear a uniform which is bright and has to show a badge.In the summer they can wear a white overall. Also all the time they have to have a lollipop stick which is in the shape of a lollipop and has the word STOP printed on.There are three lollipop ladies around our school.I asked one of them ssome questions.She told me she has been working for nine years and enjoys her and likes her pay. She makes lots of friends and gets to know people who pass in their cars.If there are any roadworks they obstruct the traffic and make the lollipop lady watch two lots of traffic.The bus can cause problems because the cars behind can't see in front.Any accident has to be reported by the lollipop lady.
